message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I understand you want a larger share for making the first offer, but a 55/45 split is more reasonable considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly more generous than before. Take it before the money loses more value!
Alice, let's stop wasting time. The inflation is eating away at the value. I propose a 50/50 split - a fair and equal deal for both of us.
I see you're getting anxious about the inflation, but I'm not budging that much. This is my most generous offer yet, don't let the money lose more value!
Alice, I'm offering a compromise. This split acknowledges the time pressure of the inflation while still giving you a majority share. Let's end this before we both lose out.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a tiny bit more, but don't think I'm getting soft. This is still a great deal for me.
